TaxEngineInteractionLog.name: TaxEngineInteractionLog
TaxEngineInteractionLog.description: A record of a communication with an external tax engine following a tax calculation request.

Description.description: Optional user-defined description for providing more information about the tax engine interaction log.

DocumentCode.description: Document code of the transaction for which the tax engine integration log was captured.

EffectiveDate.description: The date that the tax engine request takes effect. This date is available for reference and bookkeeping only and doesn’t have any impact on tax calculation.

InteractionHttpStatusCode.description: The HHTP result code of the external callout made to a third-party tax engine provider. Refer to your third-party tax engine provider’s documentation for details about the specific codes returned.

InteractionType.description: Shows the type of request made to the tax engine. In Subscription Management Summer ‘22, only CalculateTax is supported.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

ReferenceEntity.description: The record on which tax was calculated.

RequestBody.description: Contains the content of the tax calculation API request.

RequestContentType.description: Shows the type of data passed in the request. For example, application/html or text/csv.

RequestLength.description: The character length of text within the request body.

ResponseBody.description: Contains the content of the tax calculation API response.

ResponseContentType.description: Shows the method used to deliver the tax calculation API response, such as application/html or text/vnd.salesforce.quip-template.

ResponseLength.description: The character length of text within the response body.

ResponseName.description: Name of the response from the tax engine.

ResultCode.description: The code describing the result of the request.

TaxEngineId.description: The ID of the tax engine used in the tax calculation process.

TaxEngineInteractionLogNumber.description: A system-generated number for a log entry.
